author: Oliver Gettell
title: ‚ÄòScandal‚Äô cast and crew celebrate filming of 100th episode
text:
Email ABC/Bryon Cohen 
The cast and crew members of Scandal raised glasses ‚Äî full of red wine, of course ‚Äî to toast the filming of their 100th episode Thursday. 
As documented on social media, stars including Kerry Washington, Darby Stanchfield, and Tony Goldwyn celebrated the milestone with an elaborate cake featuring Scandal totems like the White House, an electric drill, a Prada handbag, and a bottle of wine. They also posed for plenty of selfies and a massive group photo. 
In an Instagram post, series creator Shonda Rhimes wrote, ‚ÄúRight now, we are shooting the 100th episode of #SCANDAL. I still vividly remember shooting the very first. Humbled. Thank you, #Gladiators.‚Äù 
ABC‚Äôs popular political thriller returned for its sixth season last month, with Washington reprising her role as the brilliant Beltway fixer Olivia Pope. The next episode (No. 95) is scheduled to air March 9. 
Check out some highlights below. Cheers to the amazing Cast and Crew of #Scandal as we celebrate the making of 100th Episode! üç∑üç∑üç∑ #Scandal100 pic.twitter.com/U9J6xlG6SQ
